channel.title: I think I"m screwed
channel.description: Hey well I've been trying to make my own server. I can;t use hamachi cause I get an error everytime I try to install it so I"m trying to use no-ip. So for my no-ip do I put my computers I.P. or my routers I.P., I tried both and they still don't work. I went to portforward.com and their tuts didn't help me (My router is airlink101w, under airlink+) I don't really get it. I tried port forwarding but when I put in the I.P. under LAN server it will only let me put in my router's I.P. not no-ip or my system IP. I don't really know what went wrong. When I launch the moparscape client I try my no-ip and my system and router I.P. but they all don't work. Also when I click run server is says server 000.0.0 I"ll put in some pictures of what I"ve been doing. Any help please =) I"ll add more pictures if you want...[br][size=1]Posted on: June 15, 2007, 01:33:51 PM[/size][hr] uploading pic[br][size=1]Posted on: June 15, 2007, 01:41:50 PM[/size][hr]Picture:[IMG]http://i68.photobucket.com/albums/i5/hurlywiz/untitled-4.jpg[/img]

item.title: I think I"m screwed
item.dc:creator: @yppman yppman
item.description:
@yppman wrote:

You set your rule to use the UDP protocol. Moparscape uses TCP. Go back to router settings and set it to use TCP.

Read full topic
